name: Post-Quantum Cryptography Playground
description: Playground to test JavaScript bindings of each round-3 finalists (and alternate candidates) of NIST Post-Quantum Cryptography Competition.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://use.fontawesome.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com; font-src https://use.fontawesome.com
